name: Introduction to TensorFlow for Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning
title: Introduction to TensorFlow for Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning
description: Master TensorFlow with Laurence Moroney in this GreatLearning course, building neural networks and training models for computer vision applications

name: Introduction to Machine learning with TensorFlow
title: Introduction to Machine learning with TensorFlow
description: Learn machine learning with TensorFlow in this Udacity course by Michael Virgo and Andrew Paster, covering both supervised and unsupervised techniques. Build real-world models using tensor flow

name: TensorFlow 2.0 Tutorial For Beginners
title: TensorFlow 2.0 Tutorial For Beginners
description: Get started with TensorFlow 2.0 in this Simplilearn YouTube tutorial, covering everything from basics to advanced concepts, including its applications and architecture.

name: TensorFlow Python
title: TensorFlow Python
description: Learn TensorFlow with Anirudh Rao on Great Learning, covering the fundamentals of building deep learning models in Python. Apply these skills to real-world machine learning projects.

name: How to Use TensorFlow for Deep Learning
title: How to Use TensorFlow for Deep Learning
description: Explore TensorFlow for deep learning in this freeCodeCamp tutorial by Manish Shivanandan, covering the basics of tensors and their use in AI models.
